CFB Data Recruiting Examples

Saiem Gilani

Source: vignettes/cfbd_recruiting.Rmd
cfbd_recruiting.Rmd

Load and Install Packages 

if (!requireNamespace('pacman', quietly = TRUE)){
  install.packages('pacman')
}
pacman::p_load(dplyr,tidyr, gt)
pacman::p_load_current_gh("sportsdataverse/cfbfastR")

CFBD Recruiting Player

Gets CFB recruiting information for a single year with filters available for team, recruit type, state and position.

cfbd_recruiting_player(2018, team = "Texas")
## ── Player recruiting info from CollegeFootballData.com ─────── cfbfastR 1.9.0 ──
## ℹ Data updated: 2022-05-31 16:22:53 UTC
## # A tibble: 29 × 19
##    id    athlete_id recruit_type  year ranking name          school committed_to
##    <chr> <chr>      <chr>        <int>   <int> <chr>         <chr>  <chr>

##  2 42931 4362086    HighSchool    2018      24 B.J. Foster   Angle… Texas       
##  3 42954 4362074    HighSchool    2018      47 Jalen Green   Heigh… Texas

##  5 42968 4362107    HighSchool    2018      61 Brennan Eagl… Alief… Texas       
##  6 42971 4362076    HighSchool    2018      64 Anthony Cook  Lamar  Texas       
##  7 43003 4362079    HighSchool    2018      96 Joshua Moore  Yoakum Texas       
##  8 43011 NA         HighSchool    2018     104 Al'vonte Woo… Lamar  Texas       
##  9 43022 NA         HighSchool    2018     115 D'shawn Jami… Lamar  Texas       
## 10 43026 4362091    HighSchool    2018     119 Ayodele Adeo… IMG A… Texas       
## # … with 19 more rows, and 11 more variables: position <chr>, height <dbl>,

## #   country <chr>, hometown_info_latitude <chr>, hometown_info_longitude <chr>,
## #   hometown_info_fips_code <chr>
cfbd_recruiting_player(2016, recruit_type = "JUCO")

cfbd_recruiting_player(2020, recruit_type = "HighSchool", position = "OT", state = "FL")

CFB Recruiting Information Position Groups. 

cfbd_recruiting_position(2018, team = "Texas")
## ── Recruiting position group info from CollegeFootballData.com ─────────────────
## ℹ Data updated: 2022-05-31 16:22:53 UTC
## # A tibble: 9 × 7
##   team  conference position_group avg_rating total_rating commits avg_stars
##   <chr> <chr>      <chr>               <dbl>        <dbl>   <int>     <dbl>
## 1 Texas Big 12     Defensive Back      0.940        19.7       21      4.05
## 2 Texas Big 12     Defensive Line      0.905        21.7       24      3.62
## 3 Texas Big 12     Linebacker          0.900         9.90      11      3.55
## 4 Texas Big 12     Offensive Line      0.912        18.2       20      3.9 
## 5 Texas Big 12     Quarterback         0.921         6.45       7      3.86
## 6 Texas Big 12     Receiver            0.913        14.6       16      3.62
## 7 Texas Big 12     Running Back        0.931         4.65       5      4.2 
## 8 Texas Big 12     Special Teams       0.872        13.9       16      3.38
## 9 Texas Big 12     All Positions       0.911       109.       120      3.74
cfbd_recruiting_position(2016, 2020, team = "Virginia")

CFB Recruiting Information Team Rankings. 

cfbd_recruiting_team(2018, team = "Texas")
## ── Recruiting team rankings from CollegeFootballData.com ───── cfbfastR 1.9.0 ──
## ℹ Data updated: 2022-05-31 16:22:53 UTC
## # A tibble: 1 × 4
##    year  rank team  points
##   <int> <int> <chr> <chr> 
## 1  2018     3 Texas 300.06
cfbd_recruiting_team(2016, team = "Virginia")
## ── Recruiting team rankings from CollegeFootballData.com ───── cfbfastR 1.9.0 ──
## ℹ Data updated: 2022-05-31 16:22:54 UTC
## # A tibble: 1 × 4
##    year  rank team     points
##   <int> <int> <chr>    <chr> 
## 1  2016    63 Virginia 164.95
cfbd_recruiting_team(2016, team = "Texas A&M")
## ── Recruiting team rankings from CollegeFootballData.com ───── cfbfastR 1.9.0 ──
## ℹ Data updated: 2022-05-31 16:22:54 UTC
## # A tibble: 1 × 4
##    year  rank team      points
##   <int> <int> <chr>     <chr> 
## 1  2016    18 Texas A&M 238.94
cfbd_recruiting_team(2011)
